Equipment Actions.Action 1: Claw, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 6 Piercing
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Tail, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 10 Piercing

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Barbed Devil makes 3 melee attacks, one with its Tail and two with its Claws.  Alternatively, the Barbed Devil can use Hurl Flame twice
Other Actions.Action 2: Hurl Flame, Ranged Spell Attack, Range: 150ft, Average Damage: 10 Fire

Abilities.Ability 1: Barbed Hide, At the start of its turn, The Barbed Devil deals Piercing damage to any creature grappling it
Abilities.Ability 2: Devil's Sight, Magical darkness doesn't impede the Devil's darkvision
Abilities.Ability 3: Magic Resistance, The Devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects

Damage Resistances.Damage 2: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons
